rules_text:
Whenever Blackfeather Cleric enters or attacks, exile target card from a graveyard. Put a +1/+1 counter on Blackfeather Cleric if it was a permanent card. Otherwise, you gain 1 life.
Surpass {5}{B} [i]({5}{B}: Transform this creature. This costs {1} less to activate for each counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Flying
Whenever Elite of Mahara attacks, exile up to two target cards from graveyards. For each permanent card exiled this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Elite of Mahara. For each nonpermanent card exiled this way, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
